      Methods in com.andrew.safronov.sintez.theblackjack.service that return Desk 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Desk GameEngineService.dealCards(long purseId)
      Method dealCards deal Card to the Player and Dealer; Method initialize new cards, shuffle it, and set two Card to Player and two Card to Dealer.
      Desk GameEngineService.doBet(long purseId, int coins)
      Method doBet take a bet from the Player
      Desk GameEngineService.doHit(long purseId)
      Method doHit take a one random Card from the Stack and deal it to the Player.
      Desk GameEngineService.doStand(long purseId)
      Method doStand interrupt game, counted Players points, and Dealer doHit and counted Points too.
      Desk PurseService.registerNewPurse(Purse purse)
      Method register new Purse in repository.
      Desk PurseService.replenishPurse(long purseID, double coints)
      Method replenish existing Purse in repository for determinate amount of coins
